meanings.sent1: The permissibleness of the action made it acceptable to everyone.
meanings.sent2: The permissibleness of the decision was questioned by many.
meanings.sent3: The permissibleness of wearing a hat indoors caused quite a stir.
meanings.sent4: Her permissibleness to explore new ideas led to great discoveries.
meanings.sent5: The permissibleness of laughter in the library brought joy to all.

meanings.definition: The state of being allowed or acceptable.
meanings.sent1: The permissibleness of the event made it a popular choice.
meanings.sent2: The permissibleness of the rule was appreciated by all.
meanings.sent3: His permissibleness to eat ice cream for breakfast raised some eyebrows.
meanings.sent4: The permissibleness of dreaming big inspired her to reach for the stars.
meanings.sent5: The permissibleness of creativity in the classroom sparked innovation.
